advisories.impact: Visiting a malicious website may lead to address bar spoofing
advisories.description: A spoofing issue existed in the handling of URLs. This issue was addressed with improved input validation.

cves.credit: Narendra Bhati of Suma Soft Pvt. Ltd. Pune (India) @imnarendrabhati

advisories.impact: Processing maliciously crafted web content may lead to arbitrary code execution
advisories.description: A use after free issue was addressed with improved memory management.

cves.credit: Liu Long of Ant Security Light-Year Lab
